mapper.sql: id, menu_title, menu_level, is_delete, updated_time, created_time
mapper.select: select id,menu_title from fke_supervision_template where menu_level =#{menu_level,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,menu_title from fke_supervision_template where parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete=1

SELECT fst3.id , fst3.menu_title, fst3.parent_id, fst3.menu_level, fst3.score FROM fke_supervision_template fst1 INNER JOIN fke_supervision_template fst2 ON fst1.id = fst2.parent_id AND fst2.is_delete = 1 INNER JOIN fke_supervision_template fst3 ON fst2.id = fst3.parent_id AND fst3.is_delete = 1 WHERE fst1.id = #{parent_id} AND fst1.is_delete = 1 GROUP BY fst3.id , fst3.menu_title, fst3.parent_id, fst3.menu_level, fst3.score
mapper.insert: insert into fke_supervision_template (menu_title, menu_level, is_delete, updated_time, created_time) values (#{menu_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menu_level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_delete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

updated_time = #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update fke_supervision_template set menu_title = #{menu_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_level = #{menu_level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{is_delete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from fke_supervision_template where 1 = 1
and id in (select a.id from (select id from fke_supervision_template where FIND_IN_SET(id,getChildList(#{template_id})))a)
mapper.select: select * from fke_supervision_template where id = (select max(id) from fke_supervision_template)
